content.webTitle: Guardian named Newspaper of Year at Football Supporters’ Federation awards

fields.headline: Guardian named Newspaper of Year at Football Supporters’ Federation awards
fields.bodyText: The Guardian has been named the Newspaper of the Year at the Football Supporters’ Federation awards for the fourth year in a row. At the awards in London on Monday night, Podcast of the Year went to The Guardian’s Football Weekly, while Liverpool’s Philippe Coutinho was named the Player of the Year and Sky Sports’ Martin Tyler and Jamie Carragher were named as Commentator and Pundit of the Year respectively. Among the other winners, Fanzine of the Year was Doncaster Rovers’ Popular Stand.
